name: Chibits
description:
A modern v-pet game! A little more strategy and a little more history. Slowly every day you improve your Chibits, customize your formation and discover about this sci-fi world. Ideal to play while watching videos, wait in queues or go by bus.

  • +50 Chibits.
  • Challenge friend's Chibits in "player vs player" section.
  • The game auto-levels for endless challenge!
  • More content will be added in future.
